name: Warming up!
description:
When their land melts away, ancestral enemies will join forces to save it. 

Join Bear and Penguin in a frenetic race against the clock! You are the only one that can DELAY THE INEVITABLE (ha, see? That's the game jam theme!) 

A game made in 48h for Ludum Dare50 & Acadevi Game Jam

What's inevitable? Thanos, right. Could have been a fun game but no, but no: climate change. Rising seas. Sinking islands. So you are on this island made of ice and it's getting warmer...

- Use arrow keys to walk and jump
- Grab fires with X and throw them away pressing X again
- If you are trapped in a deep hole, press Z to flatten a column of ice. 

Second player: ESDF + W(grab/throw)Q(hit ice)

Works with gamepads too and on mobile!
